greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers m such that 10*m^2 - 6 is a square.
comment: See the first two comments on A221874.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,38,0,-1).
maple: for n from 1 to q do if type(sqrt(10*n^2-6), integer) then print(n);
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 7, 31, 265]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 38*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 25 2013
results.author: _Bruno Berselli_, Jan 28 2013
